revision.text:
==Details== ===Description=== The Battle Frontier is a place in Hoenn where your Pokemon fight teams of three without any of your assistance. [[Items]] are permitted however you cannot click to influence the outcome of the battle.
===Rewards=== At 5 Wins you receive 25 [[Pokeball]]
At 10 Wins you receive 100 [[Pokeball]]
At 20 Wins you receive 100 [[Greatball]]
At 30 Wins you receive 100 [[Ultraball]]
At 35 Wins you receive 100 [[xClick]]
At 40 Wins you receive 100 [[x Attack]]
At 50 Wins you receive 100 [[Small Restore]]
At 100 Wins you receive Deoxys
At 110 Wins you receive 10 [[Water Stone]]
At 120 Wins you receive 10 [[Leaf Stone]]
At 130 Wins you receive 10 [[Thunder Stone]]
At 140 Wins you receive 10 [[Fire Stone]]
At 150 Wins you receive 200 [[Medium Restore]]
At 160 Wins you receive 100 [[Lucky Egg]]
At 170 Wins you receive 100 [[Lucky Incense]]
At 180 Wins you receive 100 [[Item Magnet]]
At 190 Wins you receive 10 [[Mystery Egg]]
At 200 Wins you receive 100 [[Large Restore]]
At 210 Wins you receive 40 [[Water Stone]]
At 220 Wins you receive 40 [[Leaf Stone]]
At 230 Wins you receive 40 [[Thunder Stone]]
At 240 Wins you receive 40 [[Moon Stone]]
At 250 Wins you receive 6400 [[Ultraball]]
At 300 Wins you receive 100 [[Trade Stone]]
After 300 Wins there aren't any known rewards, but there is a known record
===Record===
[[Category:Records]] [[Category:Dungeons]]
